trans-unit.source: Specifies the types of security available to a service endpoint configured to receive HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: Especifica los tipos de seguridad disponibles para un extremo de servicio configurado para recibir las solicitudes HTTP.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity> provides the security requirements for an endpoint configured with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity> proporciona los requisitos de seguridad para un extremo configurado con <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode.Transport> value is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> method, then the settings provided by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> property become effective for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Si el valor <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode.Transport> está especificado por el método <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29>, los valores proporcionados por la propiedad <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> son eficaces para el extremo de servicio.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> can only be set in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> constructor that takes it as an explicit parameter and its value cannot be set again after the binding instance is created.
trans-unit.target: El valor del constructor <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> solo se puede establecer en el constructor <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> que lo toma como parámetro explícito y su valor no se puede establecer de nuevo una vez creada la instancia de enlace.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode of security that is used by an endpoint configured to receive HTTP requests with a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el modo de seguridad utilizado por un extremo configurado para recibir las solicitudes HTTP con <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding" />.

trans-unit.source: A value of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode" /> that indicates whether transport-level security or no security is used by an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Un valor de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode" /> que indica si un extremo utiliza la seguridad del nivel de transporte o no usa seguridad.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode.None" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode.None" />.

trans-unit.source: This property determines whether the settings from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> property becomes effective.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad determina si los valores de la propiedad <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> se vuelven efectivos.

trans-unit.source: The value is not a valid <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor no es un <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode" /> válido.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode" /> property has changed from its default and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Especifica si se ha modificado la propiedad <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode" /> respecto a su valor predeterminado y se debe serializar.

trans-unit.source: This is used for XAML integration.
trans-unit.target: Se usa para la integración XAML.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si el valor de propiedad <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode" /> debe serializarse; en caso contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the Transport property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un valor que indica si la propiedad Transport ha cambiado respecto a su valor predeterminado y se debe serializar.

trans-unit.source: This is used by WCF for XAML integration.
trans-unit.target: WCF lo utiliza para la integración XAML.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si el valor de propiedad <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport" /> debe serializarse; en caso contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that contains the transport-level security settings for this binding.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un objeto que contiene los valores de seguridad de nivel de transporte para este enlace.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity" /> for this binding.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity" /> para este enlace.

trans-unit.source: The default values set are a <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ClientCredentialType" /> of <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType.None" />, a <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ProxyCredentialType" /> of <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.HttpProxyCredentialType.None" />, and <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.Realm" /> = "".
trans-unit.target: El conjunto de valores predeterminados es <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ClientCredentialType" /> de <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType.None" />, <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ProxyCredentialType" /> de <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.HttpProxyCredentialType.None" />, y <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.Realm" /> = "".

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity> object returned by this property to set the transport security parameters for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Utilice el objeto <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity> devuelto por esta propiedad para establecer los parámetros de seguridad de transporte para <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode.Transport> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode.TransportCredentialOnly> value is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> method, then the settings provided by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> property become effective for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Si el valor <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode.Transport> o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode.TransportCredentialOnly> está especificado por el método <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29>, la configuración proporcionada por la propiedad <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> es eficaz para el extremo de servicio.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode.TransportCredentialOnly> value is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> method, then the settings provided by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> property become effective for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Si el valor <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode.TransportCredentialOnly> está especificado por el método <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29>, los valores proporcionados por la propiedad <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> son eficaces para el extremo de servicio.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> can only be set in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> constructor that takes it as an explicit parameter and its value cannot be set again after the binding instance is created.
trans-unit.target: El valor del constructor <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> solo se puede establecer en el constructor <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> que lo toma como parámetro explícito y su valor no se puede establecer de nuevo una vez creada la instancia de enlace.
